-1.title: Pilot
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A powerful and mysterious disease threatens to drive humankind to extinction. A team of scientists are sent to a distant planet on the other side of the galaxy via the "Transporter" to find a rare enzyme that can save humanity. Shortly after arriving, the crew discover that things may not be as they seem.
imdb.title: For Earth
plot: A powerful and mysterious disease threatens to drive humankind to extinction. A team of scientists are sent to a distant planet on the other side of the galaxy via the "Transporter" to find a rare enzyme that can save humanity. Shortly after arriving, the crew discover that things may not be as they seem.
